sentences.sentence: I had no choice but to prove Tourette's would never get the best of me. If I quit, I would be agreeing with everyone who've ever told me I was barking up the wrong tree.
sentences.translation: 我别无选择，只能证明妥瑞症永远不会打倒我，如果我放弃了，就等于是认同了那些跟我说我白费力气的人。

sentences.sentence: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
sentences.translation: 比起悲观，乐观会让你把所有事情做得更好。

sentences.sentence: Let our advance worrying become advance thinking and planning.
sentences.translation: 把事前忧虑花的时间，用在事前的思索与准备上。

sentences.sentence: Do not let yourselves be discouraged or embittered by the smallness of the success you are likely to achieve in trying to make life better.
sentences.translation: 不要因为自己在努力改善生活的过程中可能取得微乎其微的成功而气馁，也不要为此伤心痛苦。
